content: in each st around 12 round 28 1sc decrease x4 8 fo leaving an 8inch tail for sewing sew around round 28 of leg into each side of round 4 at base of body working with light pink yarn in continuous rounds make 2 round 1 ch2 6sc in 2nd st from hook 6 round 2 2sc in each st around 12 round 3 single_crochet in each st around 12 round 4 1sc 2sc in next st x6 18 round 5-22 single_crochet in each st around 18 *start stuffing arm at this point and continue to stuff as you work up arm* round 23 7sc decrease x2 16 round 24 single_crochet in each st around 16 round 25 6sc decrease x2 14 round 26 single_crochet in each st around 14 round 27 5sc decrease x2 12 round 28 single_crochet in each st around 12 round 29 decrease x6 fo leaving an 8 inch tail for sewing position arms on either side of round 40 of body and sew through round 29 of arm to secure into place copyright holly s hobbies 2017 www ravelry com/designers/hollys-hobbies 8 you have now completed piglet this pattern was inspired by the beloved character written by a a milne i do not own the rights to this character and am in no way profiting off this free pattern this pattern is for personal use only and not for commercial resale i would love to see pictures of your final project so please feel free to share any on holly s hobbies facebook page at www facebook com/hollyshobbiesptbo please note that this pattern is not to be shared resold or posted online for public access when posting your final project online please also post a link to the original pattern on ravelry if you have any questions or concerns with this or any other holly s hobbies pattern please do not hesitate to contact me at email hollyshobbiescrafts@gmail com website www hollyshobbiescrafts com facebook www facebook com/hollyshobbiesptbo ravelry www ravelry com/designers/hollys-hobbies copyright holly s hobbies 2017 www ravelry com/designers/hollys-hobbies
